text: Dengdao wo de mingling jianglin er shui cong simianbafang yong chu shi, wo shuo:“Ni dang cong mei zhong dongwu zhong ge na yi dui [gong de yu mu de] fang zai chuan li, rang ni de jiaren he xinshimen yiqi shang chuan, fan xingfa yi panjue zhe chuwai.” Dan zhiyou shaoshu ren tong ta yiqi xinyang.
